findings.title: Passing duplicate tokens to Redemptions and TokenRequest may have unintended consequences
findings.description: Neither Redemptions nor TokenRequest contracts make a uniqueness check on input tokens during initialization, which can lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Misleading intentional miscon�guration possible through misuse
findings.description: The instantiation process for a Dandelion organization requires two separate external calls to DandelionOrg. There are two primary functions: installDandelionApps and newTokenAndBaseInstance. Misuse of these functions can lead to misleading intentional misconfiguration.
